example.context:
The new Aragon app and SDK are coming soon. Sign up for early access
Aragon Connect
Aragon Connect is a toolkit for developers to seamlessly integrate DAO functionality into apps. It's easy to use and blazing fast!
Read docsView GitHub
Integrate DAO functionality

Build apps that leverage voting, shared funds management, or anything a DAO can do!

Your frontend, your rules

Create your own experiences and interfaces specifically for your community.

Blazing fast

Decentralized apps don't have to be slow. Connect makes it fast and snappy!

Unlocking the power of grassroots coordination
Connect the world

DAOs allow people anywhere in the world to work together and start grassroots movements.

Aragon Connect unlocks the power of DAOs, enabling developers to seamlessly integrate DAO-related functionality in their apps.

Enable your community to incentivize contributors, pool funds, vote over resource allocation, and do it all through any UI you want.

Build what you want, the way you want.


Tokens
Fetching token holders

Obtain all the token holders (e.g. members) of a DAO in just 5 lines of code.


const tokens = new TokenManager(await org.app({   
  appName: 'tokens.aragonpm.eth'                  }))
const tokenDetails = await tokens.token()
‍const tokenHolders = await tokenDetails.holders()

Voting
Fetching votes

Get all votes (past and ongoing) of a DAO in just 4 lines of code.


const voting = new Voting(await org.app({     
  appName: 'voting.aragonpm.eth'                   }))
const votes = await voting.votes()

Voting
Casting a vote

Allow your user to vote on a proposal in just 6 lines of code.


const [path] = await org.appIntent(                   voting, 'vote', [votes[0].id, true, true] ).paths(wallet.account)                           for (const transaction of path.transactions) {
  await ethers.sendTransaction(transaction)
}

Powered by The Graph

The Graph turns blockchain queries that normally take minutes into milliseconds.
Aragon Connect uses a dedicated Graph Node, but can easily switch between an Ethereum node or your own Graph Node. You can decide the decentralization trade-offs!


Aragon Connect
Start developing today with the easiest development toolkit for DAOs
Read docsView GitHub
A global distributed community

We support the advancement of DAOs and decentralized governance solutions in all geographies and industries.
Be part of this revolution.

EARLY BIRD ACCESS
ARAGON AMBASSADOR PROGRAM
Apply Now

interactions.response: Aragon Connect is a toolkit for developers to seamlessly integrate DAO functionality into apps. It enables developers to integrate DAO related functionality such as voting, shared funds management, or anything a DAO can do into their apps. It's easy to use and blazing fast, allowing developers to create their own experiences and interfaces specifically for their community.

interactions.input: What are some of the features of Aragon Connect?
interactions.response: Aragon Connect features include the ability to obtain all the token holders of a DAO in just 5 lines of code, fetching votes from a DAO in 4 lines of code, and allowing users to cast a vote on a proposal in 6 lines of code. It also uses a dedicated Graph Node and can easily switch between an Ethereum node or the user's own Graph Node to allow for decentralization trade-offs.

interactions.input: What is the Aragon Ambassador Program?
interactions.response: The Aragon Ambassador Program is a global distributed community that supports the advancement of DAOs and decentralized governance solutions in all geographies and industries. It is open to anyone who wants to help spread the word and expand the Aragon community.

responses: Aragon Connect is a toolkit for developers to seamlessly integrate DAO functionality into apps. It's easy to use and blazing fast! With Aragon Connect, developers can build apps that leverage voting, shared funds management, or anything a DAO can do. You have the flexibility to create your own experiences and interfaces specifically for your community while keeping it fast and snappy. Aragon Connect unlocks the power of DAOs, enabling developers to seamlessly integrate DAO-related functionality in their apps. It allows users to incentivize contributors, pool funds, vote over resource allocation and more. Aragon Connect is powered by The Graph, which turns blockchain queries that normally take minutes into milliseconds.

Aragon Connect offers developers the ability to easily integrate DAO functionality into their apps, such as fetching token holders and casting votes. Additionally, developers can obtain all the token holders (e.g. members) of a DAO in just 5 lines of code, and get all votes (past and ongoing) of a DAO in just 4 lines of code. It also allows users to allow its users to vote on a proposal in just 6 lines of code. Lastly, Aragon Connect provides developers with the option to use a dedicated Graph Node, or switch between an Ethereum node or their own Graph Node.

The Aragon Ambassador Program is an initiative to connect Aragon supporters around the world and make decentralized governance more accessible to everyone. Invited candidates become part of a global network of representatives who are committed to promoting Aragon solutions and educating new audiences on the power of DAOs. As an Aragon Ambassador, you will have access to exclusive resources, get support to organize and grow local meetups in your area, and become a highly-reputable member of the Aragon Network.
